JoinMeetingOnly.title: Enable join meeting only mode.
JoinMeetingOnly.description: If set to true then app will not have sign in button, users can only join a meeting.

EnableSSLVerification.title: Enable SSL certificate verification (for Zoom Rooms app).
EnableSSLVerification.description: If set to true then app will stop for invalid certificate, default is false.

BlockUntrustedSSLCert.title: Block untrusted SSL certificate (for Zoom Client app).
BlockUntrustedSSLCert.description: If set to true then app will stop for invalid certificate. If set to false then user will be prompted to trust the certificate or not. If unset default to false.

DisableGoogleLogin.title: Disable Google login.
DisableGoogleLogin.description: Set to true: no login with Google. If unset default to false.

DisableFacebookLogin.title: Disable Facebook login.
DisableFacebookLogin.description: Set to true: no login with Facebook. If unset default to false.

DisableLoginWithSSO.title: Disable SSO login.
DisableLoginWithSSO.description: Set to true: no login with SSO. If unset default to false.

DisableLoginWithEmail.title: DisableLoginWithEmail
DisableLoginWithEmail.description: DisableLoginWithEmail. If unset default to false.

ForceLoginWithSSO.title: ForceLoginWithSSO.
ForceLoginWithSSO.description: ForceLoginWithSSO. If unset default to false.

SetSSOURL.title: SetSSOURL.
SetSSOURL.description: SetSSOURL. If unset default to empty

ZREnableDailyReboot.title: Enable daily reboot for Zoom Rooms
ZREnableDailyReboot.description: Set to true: automatically reboot ZR daily (in kiosk mode, randomly in 2AM - 4AM). If unset default to false.

SSOLoginRenameDisabled.title: Disable renaming for SSO users
SSOLoginRenameDisabled.description: Set to true: don't allow to rename if login with SSO. If unset default to false.

GoogleLoginRenameDisabled.title: Disable renaming for Google users
GoogleLoginRenameDisabled.description: Set to true: don't allow to rename if login with Google. If unset default to false.

SetAccountIDsRestrictedToJoin.title: SetAccountIDsRestrictedToJoin
SetAccountIDsRestrictedToJoin.description: Set account IDs that client is restricted to join a meeting hosted by specific Account ID numbers.

BandwidthLimitUp.title: BandwidthLimitUp (unit: Kbps)
BandwidthLimitUp.description: Allows the restriction of uplink traffic bandwidth from the Zoom Client.

BandwidthLimitDown.title: BandwidthLimitDown (unit: Kbps)
BandwidthLimitDown.description: Allows the restriction of downlink traffic bandwidth from the Zoom Client.
